author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-PGTI Q4 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $0.18
text:
Feb 20 (Reuters) - PGT Innovations Inc:
* PGTI REPORTS 2017 FOURTH QUARTER AND FISCAL YEAR RESULTS * Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.18 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.39 * Q4 SALES ROSE 22 PERCENT TO $134.1 MILLION * SEES ‍FISCAL YEAR 2018 NET SALES OF $550 MILLION TO $575 MILLION, INCREASING 8 PERCENT TO 13 PERCENT​
* SEES ‍FISCAL YEAR 2018 FREE CASH FLOW OF $59 MILLION TO $67 MILLION​
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.13, REVENUE VIEW $118.3 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SEES 2018 NET INCOME PER DILUTED SHARE OF $0.81 TO $0.98 * FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.72, REVENUE VIEW $543.4 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
